answer: You can buy tickets online through the following URL: https://gotoams.nl/2018/registrations
I can't give you any specific information about the schedule or the location of sessions. You can find it online: https://gotoams.nl/2018/schedule
There are some really interesting speakers at the conference this year. Find more about them here: https://gotoams.nl/2018/speakers
The conference is organized in the Beurs van Berlage in Amsterdam. Set your navigation to Damrak 243, Amsterdam and you should have not trouble finding it.
There are a few workshops, for example Advanced Kotlin, Designing microservices and one about monitoring microservices. Find out more here: https://gotoams.nl/2018/workshops
